verses.roman:
tale upare bahu-bhakta hañāche veṣṭita
dekhi' prabhura prabhāva raghunātha--vismita

synonyms: tale—the surface; upare—upon; bahu-bhakta—many devotees; hañāche veṣṭita—He was surrounded; dekhi'-seeing; prabhura prabhāva—the influence of Nityānanda Prabhu; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; vismita—astonished.
translation: Many devotees sat on the ground surrounding Him. Seeing the influence of Nityānanda Prabhu, Raghunātha dāsa was astonished.
